Coupon redemption data.

Source: R/coupon_redemptions.R
coupon_redemptions.Rd

Coupon data identifying the coupons that each household redeemed in the Complete Journey study.

coupon_redemptions

Format

A data frame with 2,102 rows and 4 variables

household_id

Uniquely identifies each household

coupon_upc

Uniquely identifies each coupon (unique to household and campaign)

campaign_id

Uniquely identifies each campaign

redemption_date

Date when the coupon was redeemed

Source

84.51°, Customer Journey study, http://www.8451.com/area51/

Examples

# NOT RUN {
if (require("dplyr")) {
# if data hasn't been imported yet
import_data(which = "all")

coupon_redemptions

# Join coupon metadata to coupon_redempt dataset
coupon_redemptions %>%
  left_join(coupons, "coupon_upc")
}
# }
